sen.j: 近衛経家（このえ つねいえ、正慶元年（1332年） - 康応元年（1389年））は室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Tsuneie KONOE (1332 - 1389) was a kugyo (top court official) who lived in the Muromachi period.
Tsuneie KONOE (1332 - 1389) was a kugyo (top court official) who lived in the Muromachi period.

He father was Tsunetada KONOE.

His mother was a daughter of Iesada KAZANIN.

sen.j: 正慶元年（1332年）に近衛経忠の子として生まれる。
sen.e: In 1332, he was born as a son of Tsunetada KONOE.

sen.j: 1347年（貞和3年）11月16日 (旧暦)叙従三位。
sen.e: On December 26, 1347, he was awarded Jusani (Junior Third Rank).

He assumed Naidaijin (minister of the Interior) (1359 - 1360) and Sekkan (regent or the top adviser to the emperor) (1365 - 1369).

He died in 1389.
